summary: Comprehensive testing completed for InstaGrowth OS with new features: Email verification, Password reset flow, Team management, White-label PDF customization, and AI-based Instagram metrics estimation. Backend APIs show 88% success rate with most critical functionality working. Frontend demonstrates excellent user experience with complete authentication flows and navigation working properly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Account creation fails due to account limit (1) reached on starter plan
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 403 error when trying to create additional accounts
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Demo user already has 1 account, upgrade plan needed

flaky_endpoints.issue: Team creation fails due to role requirement - requires Agency plan or higher
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 403 error when starter/demo users try to create teams
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Upgrade user to agency role for team management features

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu button click intercepted by overlay element

passed_tests: API health check and connectivity
User registration with name, email, password
User login authentication with demo@test.com
Forgot password endpoint functionality
Reset password endpoint validation (expected 400 for invalid token)
JWT token validation and /auth/me endpoint
Subscription plans API (4 plans: starter, pro, agency, enterprise)
Dashboard statistics API
Instagram accounts listing (demo account @demoinstagram visible)
AI audit listing endpoint
Content generation listing endpoint
Growth plans listing endpoint
Team management API structure (correct role validation)
Landing page loading with hero section
Login page with proper form elements and data-testids
Dashboard navigation and sidebar with 7 menu items
Accounts page loading with demo Instagram account visible
Team page correctly showing upgrade message for starter plan
AI usage indicator visible in header (0/10 uses)
User dropdown menu with Settings and Billing options
Forgot password flow with success confirmation
Reset password page with form validation
Registration page with complete form fields
Responsive design structure (mobile viewport tested)
